pros: OUTSTANDING work environment. From the company comping lunch daily to being able to wear jeans everyday this place just gets better and better. Ask any employee from veteran to just hired and everyone says the same...BEST PLACE EVER! Industry is booming and this is THE place to be!
cons: Not an easy commute. Driving is pretty much your best option. Public transportation is not close.
advice_to_mgmt: Keep up what you're doing. Everyone loves this place!
